titles: An essay for the recording of illustrious providences wherein an account is given of many remarkable and very memorable events which have hapned this last age, especially in New-England / by Increase Mather, teacher of a church at Boston in New-England.
author: Mather, Increase, 1639-1723.
publisher: Printed by Samuel Green for Joseph Browning and are to be sold at his shop ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Witchcraft --  New England --  Early works to 1800.
